title: Peloton Strikes Back at ‘Sex and the City’ Reboot With New Ad
sub_head: Fitness company releases ad in response to plotline about Mr. Big in ‘And Just Like That…’
body:
Mr. Big from the “Sex and the City” reboot has come back to life, this time in a new Peloton Interactive Inc . ad.
The at-home fitness equipment company wants people to know its stationary bicycles can improve physical health, not harm it, as was portrayed in Mr. Big’s recent death from the show after he was exercising on a Peloton bike.
